name: User can verify NBA standings data
scenarioId: NBA_API/NbaApiRequests:User can verify NBA standings data
methodName: User can verify NBA standings data

testSteps.description:
Given A request is made to the nba "standings" endpoint with the following
| league | season | team |
| standard | 2023 | 2 |

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Tue, 02 Dec 2025 00:48:05 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Server: cloudflare
vary: Accept-Encoding
access-control-allow-origin: *

x-ratelimit-requests-remaining: 83

pragma: no-cache
expires: 0

cf-cache-status: DYNAMIC

testSteps.description: And The NBA api request returns a response code of 200

Then The NBA api response should contain the following
| response[0].league | response[0].season | response[0].team.name | response[0].team.code | response[0].team.id |
| standard | 2023 | Boston Celtics | BOS | 2 |

title: User can verify NBA standings data
